Name: Cartoon Network Journeys VR
About the game: Cartoon Network Journeys VR is a collection original VR shorts, developed and produced by Cartoon Network Studios. Starting in a cosmic desert oasis, you encounter Gormlorm (Reggie Watts), a traveling wizard of the multiverse who guides you through three journeys into other dimensions: Beyond Beeville As an outcast one-winged bee, you must save your colony from impending collapse by teaming up with your pollen companion, Penny. Explore the garden, solve puzzles, and discover secrets beyond the hive. Created by: Tom Herpich, Bethany Martin, Elle Michalka, Estella Tse Directed by: Ryan Harwell Jest to Impress You are trying out as jester of the Kingâ€™s court. As jester-in-training, you are presented with a series of escalating props and puzzles. The more the King laughs, the more jealous his personal bard becomes. If your comedic acts fall flat, prepare to become dragon food. Complete this journey for an unlockable game mode... Created by: Nelson Boles, Eusong Lee, Spencer Rothbell, Tim Winsky Directed by: Ryan Harwell Kosma Kwest You have been summoned to the cosmic plane to become a potential replacement for Kosma, The Supreme Being, who is in desperate need of a vacation. Complete four metaphysical lessons of the cosmos and take your place on the celestial throne. Complete all journeys and gain access to Kosma Kwest: The Lost Episode. Created by: Niv Bavarsky, Ako Castuera, Jesse Moynihan Directed by: Ryan Harwell
Developers: Paper Crane Games,TwinSky Games,Cartoon Network Studios
